## Github Readme Codewars

**Display your Codewars stats on your profile README.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/ignacio-cuadra/github-readme-codewars)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://github.com/ignacio-cuadra/github-readme-codewars)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/ignacio-cuadra/github-readme-codewars)

### 参数

<details >
<summary><small>点击显示/关闭参数</small></summary><p></p>

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 参数描述 | 更多描述 |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | Codewars | Example: `mayannaoliveira`. |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `theme` | `string` |  | `default` | Theme | Support: `default`, `light`,`dark`, `halloween`, `hacker` or `dracula`. |
| `backgroundColor` | `number` |  | `#fffefe` | Background color | Background color in hex, rgb or rgba color: `255,255,255`. |
| `borderColor` | `number` |  | `#f2f0f0` | Border color | Border color in hex, rgb or rgba color: `0,0,0,0.2` |
| `textColor` | `number` |  | `#171717` | Text color | Text color in hex, rgb or rgba color: `000`. |
| `primaryColor` | `number` |  | `#1f87e7` | Primary color | Color of symbol in hex, rgb or rgba color: `1f87e`. |

</details>

```txt
https://codewars-stats-ignacio-cuadra.vercel.app/?username={username}&theme={theme}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/回到顶部-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### 示例

```markdown
<!-- Github Readme Codewars -->
![Github Readme Codewars](https://codewars-stats-ignacio-cuadra.vercel.app/?username=mayannaoliveira&theme={theme})
```
